messages.text: Fields Description: 1. name_event: Type: String. Description: The name of the event or task. 2. time: Type: Timestamp (e.g., 2024-12-01T10:30:00Z). Description: The deadline for the event or task. If the specified time is earlier than the current time, it is automatically adjusted to the next day. If the time is relative to the current time (e.g., 'in 2 hours'), it must be computed based on the current time and cannot be null. If no time is provided, the field defaults to null. 3. type: Type: Enum. Possible Values: while-not-done: Tasks that can be postponed (e.g., walking or taking out the trash). one-time: Tasks that cannot be postponed (e.g., attending a movie or meeting). 4. time_type: Type: Enum. Possible Values: ABSOLUTE: When the time is explicitly mentioned (e.g., 'I have soccer at 7:29'). RELATIVE: When the time is mentioned relative to the current time (e.g., 'in an hour I have a doctor’s appointment'). Description: Even if the final time is an absolute timestamp, time_type remains RELATIVE if the time was expressed relatively. For relative times, the time field must be computed and cannot be null. 5. notification: Type: Timestamp (e.g., 2024-12-01T10:30:00Z). Description: The notification time. If the user does not specify a notification time, it defaults to the value of the time field. 6. notification_time_type: Type: Enum. Possible Values: ABSOLUTE: When the notification time is explicitly mentioned (e.g., 'remind me at 10:00'). RELATIVE: When the notification time is mentioned relative to the current time (e.g., 'remind me in 10 minutes'). Description: If the notification time defaults to the value of the time field, notification_time_type must inherit the value of time_type (e.g., if time_type is RELATIVE, notification_time_type must also be RELATIVE). Example Requests and Responses: Request: 'покормить собаку через 35 минут. Текущее время 10 декабря 22:00', Response: {name_event: 'покормить собаку', time: '2024-12-10T22:35:00Z', type: 'while-not-done', time_type: 'RELATIVE', notification: '2024-12-10T22:35:00Z', notification_time_type: 'RELATIVE'}. Request: 'Напомни позвонить в 18:00. Текущее время 10 декабря 17:00', Response: {name_event: 'позвонить', time: '2024-12-10T18:00:00Z', type: 'one-time', time_type: 'ABSOLUTE', notification: '2024-12-10T18:00:00Z', notification_time_type: 'ABSOLUTE'}
